Class Category

java.lang.Object
fr.vinvin129.budgetmanager.models.budget_logic.Category
Direct Known Subclasses:
BudgetCategory, StandardCategory
public abstract class Category extends Object
it's a part of a Budget. Contains expenses named Spent to split in categories the expenses
